title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 700.11 - Public notice
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 700.11 - Public notice

State Regulations
A notice setting forth the title, name, business address and
business telephone number of the records access officer, and the right of any
person denied access to a record to appeal such denial to the Commissioner of

Labor at Building 12, State Campus, Albany, NY 12240, shall be posted at
conspicuous locations in Department of Labor offices. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
700.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
